results.description: Britain's Joe Choong rounds off a remarkable 2019 season by claiming silver at the Modern Pentathlon World Championships in Hungary.
results.shortTitle: Britain's Choong wins World silver
results.title: Modern Pentathlon World Championships: Britain's Joe Choong wins silver

results.description: Britain's Kate French wins bronze at the Modern Pentathlon World Championships in Budapest after claiming European silver in August.
results.shortTitle: Two GB medals in modern pentathlon Worlds
results.title: Britain's Kate French wins bronze and team silver at modern pentathlon Worlds

thumbnail.altText: Joanna Muir, Francesca Summers and Kate French

results.description: The Modern Pentathlon World Championships mixed relay takes place in Hungary - watch live BBC Sport coverage.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon World Championships - mixed relay
results.title: Watch Modern Pentathlon World Championships mixed relay

results.description: The Modern Pentathlon World Championships men's final takes place in Hungary - watch live BBC Sport coverage.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon World Championships - men's final
results.title: Watch Modern Pentathlon World Championships men's final

results.description: The Modern Pentathlon World Championships women's final takes place in Hungary - watch live BBC Sport coverage.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon World Championships - women's final
results.title: Watch Modern Pentathlon World Championships women's final

results.description: Britain's Kate French wins silver at the modern pentathlon European Championships to secure Great Britain a Tokyo 2020 Olympic spot.
results.shortTitle: GB's French wins European silver
results.title: Kate French wins modern pentathlon European silver

results.description: Great Britain's Jamie Cooke wins the men's individual gold at the European Championships in Bath.
results.shortTitle: Cooke seals Tokyo 2020 spot with gold
results.title: Jamie Cooke claims European gold and Olympic qualification

results.description: British pentathlete Myles Pillage wins his second European title in as many days with victory in the men's relay alongside Oliver Murray in Bath.
results.shortTitle: GB's Pillage & Murray win relay gold
results.title: GB's Myles Pillage & Oliver Murray win European relay gold

results.description: The men's final takes place at the Modern Pentathlon European Championships at the University of Bath - watch live coverage.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon European Championships - Men’s final
results.title: Watch the men’s final of the Modern Pentathlon European Championships

results.description: Joe Choong wants to 'break the curse' and become Britain's first male to win a modern pentathlon Olympic medal in Tokyo.
results.shortTitle: Choong aims to break 'GB curse' in Tokyo
results.title: Modern Pentathlon: Joe Choong wants to break 'GB curse' in Tokyo

results.description: Great Britain's Joe Choong wins gold at the Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final in Tokyo, securing a 2020 Olympics qualification spot.
results.shortTitle: GB's Choong secures Tokyo qualification
results.title: Modern pentathlon: Great Britain's Joe Choong wins World Cup Final gold

results.description: The Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final concludes with the mixed relay in Tokyo, Japan - watch highlights on the BBC Red Button and online.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon Mixed Relay World Cup Final
results.title: Watch: Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final - mixed relay highlights

results.description: The Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final continues with the men's event in Tokyo, Japan - watch highlights on the BBC Red Button and online.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon Men's World Cup Final
results.title: Watch: Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final - men's highlights

results.description: The Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final begins with the women's event in Tokyo, Japan - watch highlights on the BBC Red Button and online.
results.shortTitle: Catch-up: Modern Pentathlon Women's World Cup Final
results.title: Watch Modern Pentathlon World Cup Final - women's highlights

results.description: Modern pentathlete Freyja Prentice has twice been a reserve in Team GB at the Olympics and is hoping to make her mark at the 2020 Tokyo Games.
results.shortTitle: Prentice takes aim at Tokyo 2020 Games
results.title: Freyja Prentice takes aim at modern pentathlon at Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games

results.description: British pentathletes Joanna Muir and Sam Curry claim GB's fourth medal in three days in Prague with mixed relay gold at World Cup 4.
results.shortTitle: Muir and Curry win mixed World Cup gold
results.title: Modern Pentathlon: Joanna Muir and Sam Curry win World Cup mixed relay gold

results.description: British pentathlete Joe Choong wins his second successive World Cup medal with a hard-fought silver in Prague.
results.shortTitle: GB's Choong wins another World Cup silver
results.title: Modern pentathlon: Joe Choong wins second successive World Cup silver

results.description: Britain's Kate French wins modern pentathlon World Cup gold as Jess Varley takes bronze.
results.shortTitle: French wins World Cup gold & Varley bronze
results.title: Modern pentathlon: Kate French wins World Cup gold & Jess Varley bronze

results.description: British Olympic pentathlete Joe Choong claims his first World Cup medal with an impressive silver in Bulgaria, as GB's mixed relay team also finish second.
results.shortTitle: GB win two silvers at World Cup in Sofia
results.title: Modern Pentathlon: Joe Choong & GB's mixed relay team win World Cup silvers in Sofia

results.description: Britain's Samantha Murray, who won silver at the 2012 London Olympics, retires from modern pentathlon at the age of 29.
results.shortTitle: Olympic silver medallist Murray retires
results.title: Samantha Murray: London 2012 silver medallist retires from modern pentathlon

thumbnail.altText: Samantha Murray shows off her medals
